cast.original_title: ルパン三世 カリオストロの城
cast.overview: After a successful robbery leaves famed thief Lupin the Third and his partner Jigen with nothing but a large amount of expertly crafted counterfeit bills, he decides to track down the forgers responsible—and steal any other treasures he may find in the Castle of Cagliostro, including the 'damsel in distress' he finds imprisoned there.
cast.title: Lupin the Third: The Castle of Cagliostro

cast.original_title: ドラゴンボールZ 龍拳爆発!!悟空がやらねば誰がやる
cast.overview: The Z Warriors discover an unopenable music box and are told to open it with the Dragon Balls. The contents turn out to be a warrior named Tapion who had sealed himself inside along with a monster called Hildegarn. Goku must now perfect a new technique to defeat the evil monster.
cast.title: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon

details.biography:
Juji Matsuda (松田 重治, Matsuda Jūji, born May 7, 1952) is a Japanese voice actor from Hiroshima Prefecture who is affiliated with Actors House Sanoya Honten. He graduated from Hiroshima Prefectural Technical High School. His real name is pronounced Shigeharu Matsuda, and he used this name as his stage name at some point in the past.

He graduated from the Haikyo Drama Institute and TV Talent Center. He was formerly affiliated with Gekidan Kai (Kai Theater Company). Around 2004 he used the stage name Kazumaro Matsuda (松田 和磨, Matsuda Kazumaro). His special skill is karate. He also teaches acting at the workshop group "Iro Enpitsu".
details.name: Juji Matsuda
